title: For Now After the Quake - A Father's Journey
description: Beyond the horrific videos of the tsunami...Behind the news reports of the developing nuclear crisis...Hundreds of thousands of people came together - because there was nothing else to do.It was my great honor and privilege to have been there among them.It was with a conflicted heart that I left them all behind.Some things, we just can't prepare for.This is the story of 2:46 pm, March 11, 2011 - and the hours and days that followed.It is the story of the unbreakable beauty of the people I called neighbor.
author: Kevin Kato
